page.title: 11Recreation
page.content:
The open air swimming pool is heated to a temperature of 72,very necessary in summer 1985, twenty five metres long, 9 metres wide, one metre at shallow end sloping to three metres at diving board end.There is a low and high diving board and small paddling pool.Facilities are available for ice creams, lemonade and comnfectionery. Entrance fee is 65p per half day session, open May to September.
There is a triangular grass area for play, under the equipment there is a safety surface, a protection against injury. There are swings, roundabouts see-saw,rocking boat,a tall and low slide,various climbing frames, and a small car park.
